thread.title: Gigi Hadid flashes stomach at Milan Fashion Week
thread.title_full: Gigi Hadid flashes stomach at Milan Fashion Week | Daily Mail Online

author: Andrew Bullock
title: Gigi Hadid flashes stomach at Milan Fashion Week
text:
She's the poster girl for Tommy Hilfiger's all-American look.
And Gigi Hadid was the centre of attention when she descended upon Milan Fashion Week on Friday, stepping out in style to attend her TommyXGigi Spring 2017 line launch.
The 21-year-old model looked incredible in a daring metallic suit from the collection, exuding effortless glamour in the tomboy inspired attire.
Scroll down for video
All eyes on her: Gigi Hadid was the centre of attention at Milan Fashion Week on Friday, stepping out in style to attend her TommyXGigi Spring 2017 line launch
Make it metallic like Gigi in a biker jacket £730 Tommy x Gigi metallic leather jacket
Shop it here
Buy now
Gigi Hadid is currently in Milan for fashion week and today she walked a red carpet rather than a runway as she made her way to the TommyXGigi Spring 2017 line launch.
The model was of course the guest of honour and she naturally wore a look from her own collection including this blue metallic biker jacket and matching trousers. Fashionably fierce (and very statement!).
A top-to-toe metallic look is not something to be undertaken lightly, we imagine it's not an easy look to pull off. Gigi of course can wear anything and look fab. If you're not quite as brave, why not simply don a metallic biker with black skinny jeans instead to keep things more simple and all focus on the statement outerwear? Click right to snap up the blue Tommy x Gigi biker now.
Want to check out other fabulously colourful options? See below for alternatives.
* PRICES MAY NOT BE AS ADVERTISED ...NOW GET ONE LIKE IT £45 Boohoo Martha metallic biker jacket
Buy now

Buy now

Buy now
£39.99 New Look metallic leather-look biker jacket
Buy now
£775 Sarah Baily metallic girlgang biker jacket at Wolf & Badger
Buy now
Gigi flashed a hint of skin thanks to a simple crop top, which showed off her impossibly flat stomach.
The dazzling blue trousers and matching jacket ensured Gigi was hard to miss as she posed like a pro on the red carpet.
The blonde bombshell styled her blonde tresses in loose waves, with her long fringe framing her face.
Power dressing: The 21-year-old model looked incredible in a daring metallic suit from the collection, exuding effortless glamour in the tomboy inspired attire
Metallic muse: Gigi was sure to make heads turn in her metallic two-piece
Gigi completed her daring attire with a pair of unusual mules, the embroidered blue leather matching her snazzy suit.
Later in the day it was time for an outfit change.
The blonde bombshell channelled jet-set chic as she chose a contrasting outfit to head out to the Versace fashion show.
A wave of beauty! The beauty happily waved to the masses outside her appearance
Fancy footwear: Gigi completed her daring attire with a pair of unusual mules, the embroidered blue leather matching her snazzy suit
Model muse: The blonde bombshell has become designer Hilfiger's favourite muse over the last few years, both opening and closing the Tommyland runway show in Venice Beach earlier this month
Chic: Gigi left her sandy blonde locks loose as she made her way inside the venue
Thrilled: Gigi met with a fan inside the clothing store and signed his back
Impressed: The Californian native appeared impressed by her fan's drawing
Flawless: Gigi accentuated her flawless complexion with a smokey brown eye
The model wore a ribbed cream over-sized sweater, with a chunky turtle neck design and overly lengthy sleeves.
She kept it partly tucked in to her bright orange pantsuit - the blazer of which she slung around her shoulders.
She strutted straight into the sunlight sporting a pair of tinted cat eye sunglasses.
Blonde bombshell: Gigi channelled jet-set chic as she chose a contrasting outfit to head out to the Versace fashion show
Iconic: The model wore a ribbed cream over-sized sweater, with a chunky turtle neck design and overly lengthy sleeves
Finishing off the look, she sported a pair of nude ankle boots on her feet.
Ever the chamelian, she even altered her hair style from the morning - loosing the tussled fringe and straightening her locks, with a strict centre parting down the middle.
Gigi has become designer Hilfiger's favourite muse over the last few years, both opening and closing the Tommyland runway show in Venice Beach earlier this month.
Working it: She kept it partly tucked in to her bright orange pantsuit - the blazer of which she slung around her shoulders
She caused a stir on the runway at the high-profile event, where songstress Fergie performed and she was cheered by her family and Lady Gaga along the way.
Chatting to chat show host Ellen DeGeneres about the latest trends in fashion, Gigi explained that Tommy was pushing boundaries with his new collection.
She said: 'Right after the show [my looks] became available - see now, wear now, it's the new thing in runway, where you can buy it right after the show. '
Into the sun: Sporting a pair of tinted cat eye sunglasses, she completed the look with a pair of nude ankle boots on her feet
Ever the chamelian: Gigi even altered her hair style from the morning - loosing the tussled fringe and straightening her locks, with a strict centre parting down the middle
The conversation then shifted to Gigi's nearly two-year romance with former One Direction member, Zayn Malik.
'We actually met at a friend's birthday party a few years ago. Then, he was in New York to come to the Victoria's Secret show... and ended up not coming.
'I was like, "I'll play it cool, I'll go to the after party." He wasn't there,' Hadid confessed, laughing, 'And then later that week, we ended up going on our first date.'
